DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to compare myocardial perfusion imaging using Rubidium-82 PET with Tc-99m-MIBI SPET, in the evaluation of significant Coronary Artery Disease (CAD).
DOC.brief_title: Rubidium-82 PET and Tc-99m-MIBI SPET: A Head to Head Comparison
DOC.criteria: Referred for scintigraphy to assess myocardial ischaemia Ability to give informed written consent. Impaired capacity to consent Pregnancy, or breastfeeding Allergy to iv contrast Renal failure Severe Uncontrolled asthma Claustrophobia
